#summary Sample Application: FAST Corners Detector
#labels Type-SampleApps

 * Download [http://dl.dropbox.com/u/32601472/accord/samples/accord-imaging-fast-bin.zip application]
 * Download [http://dl.dropbox.com/u/32601472/accord/samples/accord-imaging-fast-src.zip source code]
 * Browse the [https://code.google.com/p/accord/source/browse/trunk#trunk%2FSamples%2FImaging%2FFAST source code online]

The FAST sample application demonstrates how to perform corners detection using the [http://accord.googlecode.com/svn/docs/html/T_Accord_Imaging_FastCornersDetector.htm FAST corners detector]. As the name implies, the FAST  detector is one of the fastest corners detectors available.
